projects.title: E-Commerce Platform
projects.description: A full-stack e-commerce solution built with Next.js, TypeScript, and Stripe integration. Features include user authentication, product management, order processing, and admin dashboard.
projects.longDescription: This comprehensive e-commerce platform demonstrates modern web development practices with a focus on performance, security, and user experience. Built with Next.js 13+ App Router, it leverages server components for optimal performance and includes features like real-time inventory management, advanced search and filtering, customer reviews, and a complete admin panel for store management.
highlights: Implemented secure payment processing with Stripe
Built responsive design with Tailwind CSS

projects.title: Task Management App
projects.description: A collaborative task management application with real-time updates, drag-and-drop functionality, team collaboration features, and project tracking.
projects.longDescription: A modern task management solution designed for teams and individuals. Features real-time collaboration using Socket.io, intuitive drag-and-drop interfaces, comprehensive project tracking, and advanced reporting capabilities. The application supports multiple project views including Kanban boards, Gantt charts, and calendar views.

projects.title: Weather Dashboard
projects.description: A responsive weather dashboard that displays current conditions and forecasts using multiple weather APIs with beautiful data visualizations and location search.
projects.longDescription: An elegant weather dashboard that aggregates data from multiple weather services to provide comprehensive weather information. Features include interactive maps, detailed forecasts, weather alerts, historical data visualization, and location-based recommendations.

projects.title: Portfolio Website
projects.description: A modern, responsive portfolio website built with Next.js and Tailwind CSS. Features dark/light mode, MDX blog, and optimized performance.
projects.longDescription: This portfolio website showcases modern web development techniques with a focus on performance, accessibility, and user experience. Built with Next.js 13+ App Router and styled with Tailwind CSS, it features a complete blog system using MDX, dark/light mode switching, and comprehensive SEO optimization.

projects.title: API Documentation Tool
projects.description: A tool for generating beautiful API documentation from OpenAPI specifications with interactive examples and code snippets.
projects.longDescription: A comprehensive API documentation generator that transforms OpenAPI specifications into beautiful, interactive documentation. Features include live API testing, code generation in multiple languages, authentication handling, and customizable themes.

projects.title: Chat Application
projects.description: Real-time chat application with rooms, private messaging, file sharing, and emoji reactions built with Socket.io.
projects.longDescription: A feature-rich real-time chat application supporting multiple chat rooms, private messaging, file sharing, emoji reactions, and user presence indicators. Built with modern web technologies and optimized for performance and scalability.
